name: Patapon 2
description:
Experience the deepest Patapon™ adventure yet!
The critically acclaimed Patapon™ franchise returns with its innovative rhythm-action game play, double the missions and bosses of the original, and a brand new multiplayer mode!
With new commands and powerful warriors to lead, take the Patapons on a brand new adventure where staying on beat is the key to victory.
Key Features:
- 80+ Missions and 40+ Bosses
- New Patapon™ Hero Character
- Ad-Hoc Multiplayer Mode
- Build your Army with New Warrior Types
- Deeper Customization Features!
Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and this item’s use restrictions. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not purchase or use this item. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 portable systems that are associated with the purchasing account.
